chapter.text: 55|1|Ara-raahamana, (dayamaya allaha)
55|2|teraemi siksa diche kora'ana
55|3|teraemi srsti karaiche manuha
55|4|teraemi taka bhasa sika'iche
55|5|Surya arau candra nirdharaita hicapa anuyayi arartana karae
55|6|arau trnalata arau brksadiye chajada karae
55|7|arau teraemi akasakhanaka samunnata karaiche arau sthapana karaiche tulacani
55|8|yate tomaloke jokha-makhata simalanghana nakaraa.
55|9|Arau tomaloke n'yayasangatabharae ojana pratistha karaa arau ojanakrta bastu kama nidiba.
55|10|Arau prthiraikhanaka te'om srsti jirara babe sthapana karaiche
55|11|ya’ta ache phala-mula arau khejura gacha, yara phala araranamukta
55|12|arau ache bakaliyukta dana arau sugandhiyukta phula.
55|13|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|14|teraemi manuhaka srsti karaiche pani misraita sukana matira paraa yito poraa matira darae
55|15|arau teraemi jinaka srsti karaiche dhomraabihina agnisikhara paraa.
55|16|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|17|teraemi du'i udayacala arau du'i astacalara pratipalaka.
55|18|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|19|teraem du'i sagaraka prabahita karae, ubhaye paraspara milita haya
55|20|kintu sihamta ubhayara majata ache eta antaraala, yito sihamte atikrama karaiba noraarae.
55|21|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|22|ubhaya sagarara paraa utpanna haya mukuta arau poraala.
55|23|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|24|arau sagarata bicaranasila parbata sadrsa nauyanasamuha te'omrae'i (niyantranadhina)
55|25|eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|26|bhuprsthata yi ache sakalo dhbansasila
55|27|arau abinasbara kerala tomara pratipalakara ceharaa, yijana mahimamaya, mahanubhara
55|28|eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|29|akasamandala arau prthiraita yisakala ache, sakalorae te'omra ocarata praarthi, te'om pratito muhurttate gurautbapurna kamata niyojita.
55|30|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|31|he manara arau jina! Ami anatipalame tomalokara (hicapa-nikaca grahanara) prati manonibesa karaima.
55|32|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|33|he jina arau manara sampradaya! Akasamandala arau prthiraira sima yadi tomaloke atikrama karaiba paraa tente atikrama karaa, kintu tomaloke (allahara) saktibihina atikrama karaiba noraaraiba.
55|34|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|35|tomaloka ubhayara prati praerana karaa ha’ba agnisikha arau dhumrapunja, tetiya tomaloke pratiraodha karaiba noraaraiba.
55|36|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|37|yidina akasa bidirna ha’ba se'idina i tejabarna golapara darae rana chalara raupa dharana karaiba
55|38|eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|39|gatike se'idina manuhako tara aparaadha samparke sodha naha’ba arau jinako nahaya.
55|40|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|41|aparaadhisakalara paraicaya poraa yaba sihamtara laksanara dbaraa, tara pichata sihamtara agaculi arau bharaita dharai tani niya ha’ba.
55|42|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|43|e'itorae'i se'i jahannama, yaka aparaadhisakale asbikara karaichila.
55|44|Sihamta jahannamara ju'i arau utala panira majata ghurai thakiba.
55|45|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|46|arau yiye tara pratipalakara sanmukhata upasthita horaara bhaya posana karae, tara babe ache duta jannata.
55|47|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|48|ubhaye'i bahu phala sakhabisista.
55|49|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|50|Ubhaya jannatata ache prabahamana duta nijaraa
55|51|eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|52|ubhayara majata ache pratyeka phala du'i du'i prakara.
55|53|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|54|tata sihamte a'uji bahiba enekuraa bichanata yara abhyantarabhaga ha'ba sinkhaperae tairai sukomala; arau ubhaya jannatara phala-mula thakiba nikatararti.
55|55|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|56|tata thakiba sbamira prati drsti simitakarai raupahisakala, yisakalaka itipurbe kono manuhe athaba kono jine sparsa karaa na'i.
55|57|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|58|sihamta yeniba hiraa arau mukuta.
55|59|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|60|uttama kamara pratidana uttamara bahirae arau ki ha’ba parae
55|61|eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|62|arau se'i duta jannatara bahirae'o arau duta jannata ache.
55|63|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|64|jannata duta haiche ghana se'i'ujiya.
55|65|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|66|e'i duta jannatata ache ucchalita duta nijaraa.
55|67|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|68|tata ache phala-mula, khejura arau dalima.
55|69|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|70|se'i jannatasamuhara majata ache caraitrararti, raupahi ramani.
55|71|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|72|camiyanaborata suraksita hai thakiba hurasakala.
55|73|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|74|Yisakalaka itipurbe kono manuhe athaba kono jine sparsa karaa na'i.
55|75|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|76|sihamte a'uji bahiba se'i'ujiya dalicha arau dhuniya sinkhapara gadiyukta asanata.
55|77|Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
55|78|barakatamaya tomara pratipalakara nama, yijana mahamahima arau mahanubhara.
